verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- is everyone יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re [is] every one that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-Lech, that walketh בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chav. in his ways

יְגִ֣יעַ <S%H3018><s%> ye-Gi-a' the labour כַּ֭פֶּיךָ <S%H3709><s%> Kap-pei-cha of thine hands כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When תֹאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chel; For thou shalt eat אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei-cha, happy וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-Tov [shalt] thou [be] and [it shall be] well לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤׀ <S%H802><s%> 'esh-te-Cha Thy wife כְּגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> ke-Ge-fen vine פֹּרִיָּה֮ <S%H6509><s%> po-ri-Yah [shall be] as a fruitful בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֪י <S%H3411><s%> be-yar-ke-Tei by the sides בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Te-cha of thine house בָּ֭נֶיךָ <S%H1121><s%> Ba-nei-cha thy children כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י <S%H8363><s%> kish-ti-Lei plants זֵיתִ֑ים <S%H2132><s%> zei-Tim; like olive סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7979><s%> le-shul-cha-Ne-cha. thy table

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- for כֵ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> chen thus יְבֹ֥רַךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-Vo-rach be blessed גָּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Ga-ver, Behold that thus shall the man יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ye-Re that feareth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha shall bless יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> mitz-Tzi-Yon thee out of Zion וּ֭רְאֵה <S%H7200><s%> U-re-'eh and thou shalt see בְּט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> be-Tuv the good יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> Kol, all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha. of thy life

וּרְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'eh- Yea thou shalt see בָנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim thy children's לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> le-va-Nei-cha; children שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Lom, [and] peace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. upon Israel
